subject: QuickDry Express overheating problem
body:
To whom it may concern,

I purchased the QuickDry Express on November 28, 2025. Serial: QDE-2025-67432.

The dryer keeps shutting off after about 5 minutes of use. I believe the overheat protection is malfunctioning because it happens even when the vents are completely clear.

I've followed all the maintenance guidelines - cleaning the filter after each use and allowing cool-down periods.

Receipt from Walmart attached.

Robert Taylor
888 Elm Street
Phoenix, AZ 85001
602-555-0129

metadata.reason: Overheat protection sensor failure is covered
